description: Relocation of window to side elevation; installation of three rooflights to main side roof slope and one in front roofslope; alteration to rear patio doors; installation of storage space below patio, and rear roof extension (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Pre-existing Elevations SO-929-02, Pre-existing Plans SO-929-01, Existing Elevations and Roof Plan SO-9290-07 Rev D received 16.11.2023, Existing Loft Plan SO-9290-04 Rev D received 16.11.2023, Existing Section SO-929-05 rev A, Existing Rear Elevation SO-929-06 Rev C received 16.11.2023, Existing Ground Floor SO-929-03 rev A.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The hereby approved rooflight to the front roof slope shall be a conservation style rooflight and shall lie flush with the plane of the roof.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The hereby approved side-facing rooflights to the second floor north elevation shall be conservation style and lie flush with the plane of the roof and shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), policies Local variation to policy 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the hereby approved extensions.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
